com.amazon.speech.slu

Class Intent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.slu.Intent

  • public final class Intent
extends java.lang.Object

    An Intent is the output of spoken language understanding (SLU) that represents what the user wants to do based on a predefined schema definition.

    For example:

    If the user said, "place a reservation," with an intent schema definition of: 

     {
     "intents":[
         {
             "intent":"ReservationIntent",
             "slots":[ ]
         }
     ]
 }

    An Intent named "ReservationIntent" would be sent to the Alexa skill.

    See Also:
    IntentRequest.getIntent()
